Serializers Documentation¶

class todolist.serializers.TaskSerializer(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: ModelSerializer

Serializer for the Task model.

This serializer is used to convert Task model instances into JSON representations. It includes fields such as the task’s ID, title, status, the user who created the task, and the user to whom the task is assigned. Additionally, it provides a custom field assigned_to_name that returns the full name of the assigned user if available.

class Meta[source]¶

Bases: object

fields = ['id', 'title', 'status', 'assigned_to', 'user', 'assigned_to_name']¶
model¶

alias of Task

get_assigned_to_name(obj)[source]¶

Retrieve the full name of the user to whom the task is assigned.

This method returns the first and last name of the assigned user as a single string. If no user is assigned, it returns None.

Parameters:

obj (Task) – The Task instance being serialized.

Returns:

The full name of the assigned user, or None if no user is assigned.

Return type:

str or None

class todolist.serializers.UserSerializer(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: ModelSerializer

Serializer for the User model.

This serializer is used to convert User model instances into JSON representations. It includes basic fields such as the user’s ID, first name, and last name.

Bases: object
